article_title: District 1 to set how it proceeds with superintendent search
article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. og.description: Yuma Elementary School District 1's search for its next superintendent may begin soon, with the governing board deciding Monday how it wants to make its initial steps toward that goal.
